ModMetaData.name: [42G]Glowing Bushes
ModMetaData.author: Fourtoo
ModMetaData.description:
Fourtoo[42G]
Gives Harvestable berries a nice glow.
Strawberry Bushes Berry Bushes Healroot Ambrosia Heat resistant Ambrosia - Alpha Animals
Glow size can be changed by a simple XML edit.
This is developed on the concept of [SYR]Glowing Healroot
[url=https://ko-fi.com/U6U3G71EL' target='_blank] [img]https://storage.ko-fi.com/cdn/kofi1.png[/img] [/url]
